content: > snuggly soft and oh-so-huggable the > ribbed texture will keep baby cozy > warm and comfortable **crochet hook 11 5mm us p-16 suggested not 12 75 mm as noted above ** gauge 9 stitches = 5 inches 5 row = 4 inches in pattern pattern # lw1505 skill level intermediate 35 ounces of yarn required
